薥字的基本解释

薥
shǔ
蜀葵，一种观赏草本植物，根和花可入药。

薥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shǔ］
［《集韻》殊玉切，入燭，禪。］
蜀葵。
[②]［zhú］
［《集韻》厨玉切，入燭，澄。］
草名。

薥字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　薥； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1062第01
【集韻】殊玉切，音屬。薥葵，草名。　又厨玉切，通䕽。詳䕽字註。

薥字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
薥字的起名意思

暂无。

薥
Basic explanation of words
薥
shǔ
Hollyhock, an ornamental herb, the root and flower can be used as medicine.
薥
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shǔ]
["Ji Yun" special jade cut, candle, Zen. ]
Hollyhock.
[②]［zhú］
["Ji Yun" Chu Yu cuts, enters the candle, clears. ]
Cursive name.
薥
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of 艸 Characters] 　薥; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1062 No. 01
[Ji Yun] special jade cut, the sound is genus. Scallop, grass name.　Cook the jade again, all through. Detailed 䕽 word note.
